en.error_login_required: Enter username and password to login.
en.text_about_report: Through our extensive experience with participatory projects from all over the world combined with years of thorough research, we bring you the most comprehensive guide on digital participation and Civic Tech tools that are available on the European market. By obtaining the Report, you will get an artistically-designed hard copy of the book for your bookshelf along with an access to online Civic Tech Market Report platform with regular news and product updates for easy browsing through the catalogue of tools and accompanying depository of knowledge.
en.text_hero: Explore major trends that are currently shaping the field of digital participation. Get access to the insights from top-tear industry experts and gain a perfect overview of the European Civic Tech ecosystem and detailed information about over 80 solutions with accompanying case studies.
en.text_hero_presale: Explore major trends that are currently shaping the field of digital participation. Get access to the insights from top-tear industry experts and gain a perfect overview of the European Civic Tech ecosystem and detailed information about over 80 solutions with accompanying case studies. Sign up now to pre-order your copy of Civic Tech Market Report 2025 for the early-bird price!
en.text_pricing_row1_title: Personalised hard copy of the Report delivered to you
en.text_pricing_row2_title: Access to the online platform for the 2025 edition of the Report
en.text_pricing_row3_title: Regular news, updates, and expert articles available on the platform
en.text_pricing_row5_title: Team/group discount if obtained for 3 or more people
en.text_what_you_get1: Over 250 pages of expert information about Civic Tech in an artistically-designed book edition suited for your bookshelf.
en.text_what_you_get2: Easy-to-use online platform with an interactive catalogue of Civic Tech tools, all the content from the book, and some additional updates.
en.text_what_you_get3: Latest news from the Civic Tech industry, expert interviews, innovation updates, case studies, and much more available on the online platform.
en.text_who_for1: Find the right tools for your participatory processes, write better tenders, improve your digital strategy, and educate your team.
en.text_who_for2: Identify digital solutions for systemic participation, and support participation initiatives in regions.
en.text_who_for3: Explore the market, identify your competition, learn about current trends, and find new use cases for your tool.
en.text_who_for4: Learn about the best practices in digital participation and bring higher value to your clients.
en.text_who_for5: Find out how to run a digital participatory project and select the tool that fits your resources.
en.text_who_for6: Select the right digital solution for public space and urban development projects and enhance your community engagement process.

cs.error_login_required: Zadejte uživatelské jméno a heslo pro přihlášení.
